verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lately I've been lookin' back

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Along this winding road

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: To the old familiar markers

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: of the mercies I have known

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And though it may sound so simple

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: But it's more than a cliche

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: No other words to tell you than to say...

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: God's been good

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
In my life,
I feel blessed beyond my wildest dreams

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: When I go to sleep each night

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: Though I have my share of hard times

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: By my side He's always stood

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: Through it all, God's been good

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: Times replay and I can see

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: That I've cried some bitter tears

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: But I've felt his arms around me

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: As I faced my darkest fears

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: I know I've more than gains than losses

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: And I've known more joy than hurt

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: As his grace rolled down upon me, undeserved

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: For God has been my Father

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: My Savior and my friend

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: His love is my beginning

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: And his love would be my end

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: I could spend forever trying

verse.name: v26
verse.lines: To tell you every thing he is

verse.name: v27
verse.lines: But the best way I could tell you is this

verse.name: v28
verse.lines: God's been good in my life,

verse.name: v29
verse.lines: I feel blessed beyond my wildest dreams
